projects.title: AI Chatbot for Education
projects.description: A conversational AI assistant designed to help students and teachers with instant answers, study support, and administrative queries in an educational environment.

projects.title: Online Portfolio Builder
projects.description: A web-based platform that enables users to create, customize, and share professional portfolios to showcase their skills, projects, and achievements.

projects.title: Hospital Management System
projects.description: A comprehensive software solution for managing hospital operations, including patient records, appointments, billing, staff, and inventory.

projects.title: Smart Attendance using Face Recognition
projects.description: An automated attendance system that leverages facial recognition technology to mark and track student or employee attendance accurately and efficiently.
